translation.en: [girl 1] This is my last chance to be normal.
translation.ko: 평범하게 살 수 있는 마지막 기회야

translation.en: The world don't know that yet.
[girl 2] I don't want to share you with the world.
Oh, y'all in here kissing again, huh?
[girl 1] I told you to stop climbing through my window,
'cause if Mommy catch you, I'mma get a beating.
You're the only one she ain't gonna beat. Mommy slapped the shit out of me last week.
translation.ko: - 누나가 언제 맞았다고? - 지난주에 한 대 맞았어

translation.en: It's 'cause you told her to go to hell. You deserved it.
[girl 2] She tells your father to go to hell all the time.
She's grown. She can do that.
As long as we live in this house, we children.
And children must honor… [both] …thy mother and thy father.
It's in the Bible. You gotta do it.
If we did everything the Bible say, we'd live in a pretty messed-up world.
translation.ko: 성경대로 살면 세상은 엉망이 될 거야

translation.en: Why you always want what I got?
[girl 2] I don't know why, you don't do shit.
She ain't never had a hard day's work in her life.
Mommy makes me practice for six hours a day,
and she yells at me the whole time.
Both of y'all can shut the fuck up.
Get your asses down here right now! Your father's home!
-She ain't call my name. -[Abel] Don't worry. I'll protect you.
translation.ko: - 난 안 부르시던데 - 걱정 마, 내가 있잖아

translation.en: and when she starts giving me the evil eye, you don't do shit.
translation.ko: 나 째려보실 때마다 아무 말도 못 하면서

translation.en: Don't be messin' up my bag, boy.
What was y'all doing up there?
Go in there and say hello to your daddy.
Why you let him smoke that cigar in the house?
Look, I don't care if you do it. Just don't bring it around your sister.
[Father] You singing in church or something?
I was just trying to help.
Look at that. Do you like it? -It's beautiful. -Mmm.
Take it out. Let me put it on you. You just pull that.
translation.ko: 매 줄 테니까 꺼내렴, 빼면 돼

translation.en: in honor of God's love for you.
Turn around. Let me put this on you.
This will affirm your faith, keep you safe,
translation.ko: 네 믿음을 굳건하게 하고 널 지켜 줄 거야

translation.en: [echoing] …that God loves you as His own.
Always wear this. It'll protect you, keep you safe.
translation.ko: 언제든 매고 다니렴 널 지켜 줄 거야

translation.en: Always wear this. Always… It'll protect you. [echoes overlapping]
translation.ko: 언제든 매고 다니렴 하나님의 사랑이 느껴질 거야

translation.en: How come you didn't bring me nothing?
-[Beauty] I thought you liked-- -Get them bags upstairs, boy.
translation.ko: - 언제부터 핫도그를… - 짐 위층에 두고 와

translation.en: [Abel] You lucky Beauty was here. I was about to drop your ass.
Nigga, you wasn't about to do shit. Beauty just saved your life.
translation.ko: 작살은 무슨 뷰티 덕분에 네가 살았지

translation.en: I'm sick of his ass always trying to punk me. He just mad 'cause he ain't cute like y'all.
translation.ko: - 매번 못살게 굴잖아 - 네가 잘생겨서 질투하는 거야

translation.en: Ain't my fault he got a ugly daddy.
[Mother] Do not say that about your brother.
You're never going to convince me
that in order to live, I gotta eat something dead.
You ain't gonna convince me. It's not gonna happen.
translation.ko: 절대 안 믿어, 말도 안 돼

translation.en: [inhales] I heard you shut the place down last night.
Wanted to see if you got what it takes.
I guess I do. I could've told you that.
Still can't hold a candle to me, though.
Nobody can hold a candle to you.
If the student is not as good as the teacher,
then the teacher's not doing a good job.
[Father] Well, you have done a wonderful job teaching her, honey.
She still got some work to do.
I think she ready for the big time.
Don't speak at my table unless I ask you a question.
translation.ko: 말 걸기 전까지는 입 다물고 있어

translation.en: -I don't need permission to speak. -When you're in my house, you do.
-Then I'll leave. -Yeah! Get the fuck out!
Beauty, let her go. Don't need this devil worshipper in my home.
translation.ko: 뷰티, 붙잡지 마 사탄 숭배자 따위

translation.en: -I don't worship no devil. -You don't worship God.
Can we all just calm down?
[Father] We are having a family discussion,
and last time I checked, you aren't part of this family.
translation.ko: 가족끼리 얘기하고 있잖아 내가 알기로는 넌 우리 가족이 아닐 텐데

translation.en: -Maybe one day I will be. -[Father] What you gonna do?
I wouldn't touch that thing with a ten-foot pole.
Let's run away and get married and never come back.
translation.ko: 사랑의 도피를 떠나 돌아오지 않는 거야

translation.en: You think marriage is a joke? Huh?
"For this reason, a man leaves his mother and father
and unites with his wife to become one."
That you're one flesh with your wife?
That you only have eyes for her?
Cain, would you take my plate, please, son?
[woman] Oh, well, your husband asked me to come by around six.
-Why you leave her on the doorstep? -I don't want her up in my damn house.
translation.ko: - 왜 그냥 두고 왔어? - 내 집에 들이기 싫으니까

translation.en: [Mother] I don't need to hear her out to know she full of shit.
Then I'mma talk to her myself.
You can't make a decision like that without me!
I'mma ask the woman in if that's all right with you.
and… beauty of Lena, soul of Billie, the--
Yes, she does. You taught her well.
The torch has to be passed to someone,
and I believe that someone is your daughter.
That's the same thing she said to me ten years ago.
And I was telling the truth.
It's just that I think you were ahead of your time.
No. Beauty is right on schedule.
translation.ko: 네, 뷰티는 지금 시대에 딱 맞죠

translation.en: A blind man could tell you she's going places.
translation.ko: 재능 있다는 말은 누구나 할 수 있지만

translation.en: It takes somebody who knows what to do…
translation.ko: 재능을 이용하는 건 아무나 못 해요

translation.en: I can shape that to make something out of that…
translation.ko: 저는 재능을 다듬어서 이용할 수 있죠

translation.en: I can bring people to the table…
…so that everyone in America is gonna want a piece of her.
translation.ko: 온 국민이 뷰티에게 열광하도록 할 거예요

translation.en: And she can make you a whole lot of money, can't she?
[woman] We can agree to work together on this.
I can promise you you're never gonna have to work again for the rest of your life.
translation.ko: 장담하는데 평생 일할 필요가 없을 거예요

translation.en: [Mother] And if everybody gets a piece,
And I want what's best for her.
You want what's best for your bank account.
Don't make me smack you in front of this white woman.
translation.ko: 저 여자 앞에서 맞기 싫으면 조용히 해

translation.en: to make you know that I have Beauty's best interests at heart?
translation.ko: 제가 어떻게 해야 믿음이 생길까요? 뷰티를 진심으로 위하고 있어요

translation.en: You can wait. A few more years.
You don't know what's out there.
The… the record industry is the devil,
and he's just waiting to swallow you up.
[Mother] Do you know what they do to stars, huh?
They build you up just so they can tear you down.
Can't nobody tear me down, Mommy.
You taught me to keep my head high
Go to your room or be dragged.
I am not sending her out in the world to be eaten by wolves.
translation.ko: 늑대가 득실대는 세상에 내보낼 수는 없어

translation.en: [Father] How you know that she not a wolf?
translation.ko: 뷰티가 늑대일 거라는 생각은 왜 안 해?

translation.en: 'Cause she came out of my body.
Can you hand me that rag over there?
What you doing up so early?
For sure, you got a lot on your mind.
Hey, get in the car. Try to turn it on.
[Father] You in the driver seat now.
Move over. I'll take it from here.
You really think I'm gon' make it?
I think that you're gonna give people hope.
God, I can't help but look at you and still see my little girl. [inhales]
I just wish I could hold on to you a little bit longer.
translation.ko: 내 품을 떠나지 않으면 좋을 텐데

translation.en: When you sign that contract, everything's gonna change.
translation.ko: 계약서에 서명하면 모든 게 바뀔 거야

translation.en: probably be the hardest thing I ever have to do.
It's not easy for a father… [inhales] …to send his little girl out into the world.
translation.ko: 아빠가 딸을 세상에 내보내는 건 쉬운 일이 아니니까

translation.en: Jasmine and I were talking-- She's not your family.
you're gonna regret it the rest of your life.
Well, sometimes greatness skips a generation.
Why you let him do that?
You live your life, and I'll live mine.
You really think you can trust him? Of course I can.
[Jasmine] Just 'cause he's your father doesn't mean he's trustworthy.
translation.ko: 아빠라고 해서 믿을 수 있는 건 아니지

translation.en: You gonna sign the contract or not?
Your life's gonna get real big real fast.
It's gonna be like a freight train you can't stop.
translation.ko: 빠르게 달리는 열차처럼 멈출 수 없겠지

translation.en: Yeah, but you'll be on that train with me.
translation.ko: 넌 나랑 그 열차에 같이 탈 거야

translation.en: What if I want my own train?
My train will be a lot nicer.
-I don't got no money. -[bartender] It's on the house.
How come you never give me no free shit? [bartender] She prettier than you.
Is that your way of giving God praise?
You are not singing from your gut.
-I'm trying. -Y… y'all hear me do it every Sunday.
translation.ko: 노력하고 있어요 주일마다 내가 어떻게 하던?

translation.en: No, you won't, 'cause I done had enough.
[Mother] You are way too pretty and way too talented
to walk out on a national stage and not be noticed.
translation.ko: 큰 무대에 서면 금방 눈에 띌 거야

translation.en: [Beauty] I just wanna use the gift God gave me.
[Beauty] People can fantasize about me all they want.
[Mother] It's way too much to live up to.
I have sung behind people my whole life.
Never had the spotlight on my face.
But I've been close enough to see 'em get burned by it.
It ain't all it's cracked up to be.
It's not about you being careful.
It's about you having to be something you not.
[scoffs] You can't spend the rest of your life trying to be something else.
You will end up forgetting who you really are.
translation.ko: 네가 정말로 누군지 잊게 될 거야

translation.en: You think I don't know who you are?
Folk gon' wanna know who you laying with, Beauty.
translation.ko: 네가 누구와 한 침대에 눕는지 다들 궁금해할 거야

translation.en: -And that's none of their business. -And that ain't how none of this work.
translation.ko: - 관심 끄라고 해요 - 세상은 그렇게 만만하지 않아

translation.en: Just 'cause it didn't work out for you doesn't mean it won't work out for me.
translation.ko: 엄마가 실패했다고 저도 실패하는 건 아니죠

translation.en: You are sheltered, and you're spoiled.
We have spent our whole lives trying to protect you.
translation.ko: 우린 널 지켜 주려고 평생 애썼어

translation.en: When you walk out on that stage, we can't come with you.
translation.ko: 하지만 무대에 오르면 곁에 있어 줄 수 없잖니

translation.en: So who gonna do it, then?
The world ain't ready for that.
-I don't sleep in a bed with my friends. -That's because God's your only friend.
translation.ko: - 난 친구랑 같이 안 자 - 친구라고는 하나님뿐이니까요

translation.en: Life, life is about balance, Beauty.
For every good thing you get,
something bad… something bad is gonna happen.
It's okay if I'm not with you on that train.
Can't always get everything you want.
translation.ko: 원하는 걸 전부 가질 수는 없어

translation.en: 'Cause that's not how the world works.
You don't think I should sign that contract, do you?
translation.ko: 계약서에 서명하면 나 후회할 것 같아?

translation.en: I don't think your father's the only one that should be looking at it.
translation.ko: 네 아빠 말고 다른 사람한테도 보여 줘

translation.en: -Find a lawyer. -I don't know how to do that.
I'll always be here to protect you.
translation.ko: 난 항상 널 지켜 줄 거야

translation.en: I woke up this morning. I had no doubts.
How many of y'all had doubts?
Well, we gonna clear that up right now.
All right now. How you doing, sister?
[pastor] Give it up for this beautiful choir, y'all!
Stand up if you love Him. Stand up if you love Him!
[pastor] All right, y'all. I have no doubts.
[pastor] Hey, help me remember ya right here.
Shout for Jesus. Raise your hands for Jesus.
I see some smiles in here.
You got the pearls on today.
[Mother] We're all excited until the bottom drops out, right?
We all waiting here. She's gonna just take that pen
translation.ko: - 맞아 - 뭐라고 했냐면… 이제 펜을 들고 3쪽에 서명해야지

translation.en: I want my lawyer to look at it.
Your dad and I have looked that contract over a million times.
translation.ko: 네 아빠와 계약서를 수백 번은 검토했어

translation.en: Now my lawyer could go over it again.
What you need with a lawyer?
Jasmine thought I should get one.
What you doing? Come over here. Get up. Come on, now. Right now!
translation.ko: 무슨 짓이야? 따라와 일어나, 당장 이리 와!

translation.en: What the hell you think you're doing?
I'm just looking out for myself.
That's what this is about for you.
And I wanna make sure I have a say in it.
-You know she has a name. -I don't give a shit what her name is.
translation.ko: - 걔도 이름 있어요 - 이름 따위 관심 없어

translation.en: I am your father, and you're not gonna disrespect me.
I'm not trying to disrespect you.
I wanna make sure I'm doing the right thing.
If you don't sign that contract now,
I'mma put your shit on the front lawn, and you can fend for yourself.
translation.ko: 네 짐을 갖다 버릴 거니까 알아서 살아

translation.en: After all I done for you, this is how you repay me?
translation.ko: 내가 널 어떻게 키웠는데 이럴 수가 있니?

translation.en: I never thought I'd see the day
when my own daughter thinks I'm trying to steal from her.
translation.ko: 내가 네 돈을 탐낼 거라고 생각하다니

translation.en: Well, you better figure it out, honey.
You better make a decision fast
because we worked too hard to get here for you to throw it all away.
translation.ko: 이 기회를 날리기엔 우리가 너무 고생했거든

translation.en: Okay, gonna be a big star.
-[woman] We did it. -[Father] I think we did it together.
And I'm gonna be there for you every step of the way.
translation.ko: 엄마는 언제나 네 곁에 있을 거야

translation.en: Are you really happy for me, Mommy?
Why your face lookin' so long?
What you mean you can't find her?
I called her house three times, and no one answered.
translation.ko: 세 번이나 전화했는데 아무도 안 받길래

translation.en: And then I went over there, and her mom said she wasn't home.
Okay, well, I'm sure she's fine. She'll turn up.
Why don't you come downstairs with us and have a drink?
Your brothers is already down there drunk.
what kind of man you are.
I could tell you what kind of man Abe won't be.
translation.ko: 에이브가 어떤 남자가 될지는 내가 잘 알지

translation.en: [Father] Yeah, he living the life right now.
'Cause he got my good looks and his mother's charm.
That's why he always walk around with that stupid look on his face.
now 'cause as he gets older, his looks will fade,
as will his ability to talk women out their panties.
And he would be sad and miserable.
and his children will only love him
will feel compelled to keep his memory alive.
'Cause I wasn't there when you conceived.
-But you was there when I was born. -Yeah. Not the same.
I'm still trying to figure you out.
[Cain] Well, what you need to know?
if you'd do something for me.
I'd do anything for you, Pop.
[Cain] What you need me to do?
The fuck you mean "make her go away"?
Show me what kind of man you are.
translation.ko: 네가 나와 같은 남자라는 걸 증명해

translation.en: [Cain] Me and Abe just 'bout to go for a ride.
Get your ass in the fucking car.
-I'll tell you when we get there. -Fuck that. Tell me now.
translation.ko: - 도착하면 알려 줄게 - 됐어, 당장 말해

translation.en: -Just relax. -Nigga, don't tell me to relax.
I ain't got nothing against Jasmine.
If Beauty want a lady friend, that's her business. It ain't got nothing to do with us.
translation.ko: 누나가 여자를 만난대도 우리와는 상관없는 일이야

translation.en: -It's got everything to do with us. -It's her life.
We can't have evil people hanging around our sister.
translation.ko: 뷰티가 나쁜 사람들과 어울려서는 안 돼

translation.en: You need to man the fuck up!
-Get your ass out! -You really wanna fuckin' fight me?
Come out before I drag your ass out.
What? Try and hit me again!
Come here! You run like a girl, motherfucker!
I don't think I've seen you in here without her.
Yeah, well, I… I can be alone sometimes.
translation.ko: 뭐, 저도 혼자 다닐 때가 있어요

translation.en: You know, I got some shit if you want it.
Yeah, that's not really my thing. It's Beauty's.
Well, maybe you could gift it to her.
[Jasmine] Come on, my dude. That ain't no gift.
It would be if you gave it to her.
-[Jasmine] Meet you where? -Out back. Come on.
[bartender] Yeah… Right over here. I got you.
I told you I got you. Come on.
You ain't got nothing to say to me, boy?
You, who are just like me?
You couldn't do that shit, boy.
Just like everything else I ask you to do.
[Beauty] We just gotta get out of here.
You live your life, I'll live mine.
Why didn't you say it back?
♪ I'm in love, love, love, yeah ♪
[Beauty] We finally have a place of our own.
to the criticism you've been getting from your Black audience?
Well, some people say that you're pandering to a white audience
translation.ko: 혹자는 당신이 백인 관객들을 만족시키려 하고

translation.en: and that you don't want your music to sound too
-[woman whispers] Stay in character. -No, I'm asking you a question.
No, we… we are gonna first appeal to the urban audience.
[woman] Well, we're gonna choose a song
that Black women are going to love.
Also, that white teenage girls are gonna go crazy over
and play over and over and over again.
That way, you'll get both sides of the market.
translation.ko: 그럼 두 관객을 전부 사로잡을 수 있어

translation.en: Now, I'd like you to answer the question that I ask you,
and I'd like you to do it in proper English.
I… I don't know how to sing in Black, white…
translation.ko: 전 특정한 인종처럼 노래할 줄 몰라요

translation.en: I just know how to sing, because that's what I like to do.
translation.ko: 그냥 노래하는 걸 좋아해서 할 뿐이죠

translation.en: You have a lot of love songs on your album.
who are you singing them to?
Let's just go with the answer we prepared.
Why do I have to do this?
Because you cannot just be a singing star.
translation.ko: 그저 노래만 하는 우상이 될 수는 없으니까

translation.en: You, Beauty, have to be the whole package.
translation.ko: 뷰티, 넌 모든 걸 갖춰야 해

translation.en: There are a lot of little… little girls
who need someone to look up to.
If you wanna be a star…
you're gonna have to wear a mask.
Let's answer the question as it was prepared.
I haven't found that special someone yet.
But when I'm singing those love songs,
I'm thinking about what he could be.
translation.ko: 그 사람이 과연 어떤 남자일지 생각해요

translation.en: Um, please don't say that in public.
Just wait for when we're at the house, okay?
translation.ko: 집에 갈 때까지 참아 줘, 알겠지?

translation.en: This is all still a lot for us to get used to.
translation.ko: 아직 다들 적응하기 힘든 거 알아

translation.en: I don't care what you do at home.
Just when we're out and about, we have a certain image to maintain.
translation.ko: 밖에서는 우리가 지켜야 하는 이미지라는 게 있어요

translation.en: I just want what's best for you.
I know what's best for me.
Why don't you try on one of the long, black, flowing ones?
translation.ko: 길고 찰랑거리는 가발도 써 보는 게 어때?

translation.en: Why can't I just rock my own hair?
that little Black girls like long, flowing hair.
translation.ko: 통계에 따르면 흑인 소녀들이 길고 찰랑거리는 머리를 좋아한대

translation.en: Maybe that's because people like you
always tell them that's the only way they can be beautiful.
translation.ko: 길고 찰랑거리는 머리만 예쁘다고 해서 그렇겠죠

translation.en: You sure you don't wanna try a long one?
No. Actually, I like the short, curly one.
[Jasmine] Yeah, I like that one too.
[woman] Max, slap that one on there, and let's take a look at it first.
translation.ko: 맥스, 가발은 치우고 생머리는 어떤가 보죠

translation.en: Ooh, ah, ah, ah, let's go.
Turn and dip and move that hip. Okay!
translation.ko: 돌아서 튕기고 엉덩이를 흔들어요 아주 좋아요

translation.en: One more time. Let's go. And…
I never met a Black person who couldn't dance before.
translation.ko: 춤을 못 추는 흑인은 처음 봤어요

translation.en: She ain't every pop star. Just keep the steps simple.
translation.ko: 쟤는 그런 사람이 아니에요 단순하게 가요

translation.en: She can join up for some of those, and then the complicated stuff,
translation.ko: 단순한 건 따라 할 테고 어려운 동작이 나오면

translation.en: she can be out front doing one of her long runs.
Trust me, she hates this shit.
[man] I'm sorry. It's just an expression.
I don't give a fuck what it is. Don't be calling my girl no horse.
Do we have the words to give you? Can we do that on the stand?
[woman] So you're not looking at it, but is there a way…
I need some amazing vocalists behind her.
Who do you have in mind?
[neighbor] Hey, um, can you turn it down, please?
I've been living here two whole years. Been quiet as shit.
Teenagers move in, and I haven't had a peaceful night since.
translation.ko: 10대 애들이 이사 오더니 조용한 날이 없군요

translation.en: You motherfuckers always playing music loud, giggling and shit.
translation.ko: 귀청 떨어지는 음악 소리에 깔깔대기나 하고

translation.en: Well, you sure do look like one.
That's because you haven't seen me with my clothes off.
translation.ko: 벗은 몸을 본 적이 없으니 그렇겠죠

translation.en: Listen, just, uh… just try to keep it down, okay?
You were talking to him a long time.
Relax, he just wanted me to turn the music down.
translation.ko: 별거 아니야 그냥 소리 좀 낮춰 달라더라

translation.en: I'm surprised you didn't cuss his ass out.
I wasn't in the mood to cuss his ass out.
You always in the mood to cuss somebody out.
[woman] So you ready for your big debut?
[woman] Irv wants you to come on his show and sing.
So you're going on his show, and you're gonna sing.
[Beauty] The album ain't even done yet.
[woman] Nobody wants you to go on The Irv Merlin Show
and sing a song they've never heard of.
[Beauty] I don't wanna go on TV singing someone else's song.
translation.ko: 방송에서 다른 사람 노래를 부르기는 싫어요

translation.en: I wanna sing my own music.
[woman] Nobody's gonna care what you're singing.
What they care about is that you are a young, beautiful woman
translation.ko: 사람들이 신경 쓰는 건 네가 천사 같은 목소리를 가진

translation.en: with a voice of an angel.
That song is wholesome, and Irv's audience knows that.
translation.ko: 시청자들은 의미 있는 노래라는 걸 알아

translation.en: You mean white people know it.
Well, why don't you take this?
See if you can learn something.
Take these and see what a couple of my big stars did with their opportunity.
translation.ko: 내가 키운 대스타들이 기회를 어떻게 잡았는지 말이야

translation.en: I have a conference call in five.
Kelly, get me Stevie on the phone.
[Beauty] Are you gonna come in with me?
How come Mommy didn't call me?
He's at Saint Michael's on the fifth floor.
I'm sorry I didn't come earlier to visit you. I…
I didn't know you were sick.
They said they have to open me up,
Not getting enough blood or something.
But I'm young. I can do all that.
-If I don't make it outta here-- -Don't… don't say that.
Let me speak my piece, okay?
I've always been an ambitious man.
I got that from my father.
I think that's why I was so determined to make something of myself.
translation.ko: 그래서 내가 성공을 갈망한 게 아닐까 싶다

translation.en: I wanted my life to have meaning.

translation.ko: 깨달았지 우리 집 가장이라는 위치에 만족해야 한다고

translation.en: for just being the head of my house.
translation.ko: 우리 집 가장이라는 위치에 만족해야 한다고

translation.en: I wasn't even good at that.
That's why it was so important
to me that you make it.
I thought, if you went far,
[Father] That's why it's hard for me to say this…
but I need you to give me my cut.
[Father] I'm the one negotiated that contract for you. You know what? I'm not doing this.
[Father] I know you got a new apartment downtown.
translation.ko: 시내에 아파트 구한 거 알고 있어

translation.en: I even heard you bought your little girlfriend a car.
Yeah, and where'd you hear that?
You can't keep nothing from me.
Is that why you wanted to see me?
[Father] All I need is for you to pay me what you owe.
translation.ko: 나한테 빚진 거만 갚으면 해결될 문제야

translation.en: You owe me your whole life.
[chuckles] I didn't think the business was gonna change you,
but you up in here acting all crazy, and you ain't even had a hit record yet.
translation.ko: 아직 성공한 음반도 없으면서 뭐라도 되는 것처럼 구는구나

translation.en: I'mma have a whole bunch of 'em.
And while I'm celebrating, drinking champagne,
Those the last words you wanna say to your father?
translation.ko: 그게 네 아빠한테 마지막으로 하고 싶은 말이니?

translation.en: Is that how you want me to remember you?
translation.ko: 내 기억에 그런 식으로 남고 싶어?

translation.en: [Irv] How would you describe the young lady who's about to come out here?
Well, I would say she's magical.
[woman] Thank you. And I think she's strong and confident.
It's true. She has a beautiful complexion.
You ready? Of course I am.
Your father would be so proud.
Jas, can you put that thing away?
This is a big deal. I wanna capture the moment.
Wha-- You hear how slow they playing?
If they play like that, you'll put everybody to sleep.
I'mma go tell them to speed it up.
Ma, they the house band. I think they know what they doing.
They're used to playing for little white girls.
But if it wasn't for her, I wouldn't be here.
[neighbor] Listen, I ain't got all day now.
Yo, who the fuck is that?
It's the boy from the other apartment, the one complaining about the music.
Not yet, but I will be.
Yeah? What makes you so sure?
that no one can sing better than me.
Can't nobody sing better than her.
Well, we just gonna have to see about that, ain't we?
Well, um, I just wanted to come back here, uh, wish you good luck, give you those.
translation.ko: 잠깐 들러서 응원하고 꽃도 주려고 왔어요

translation.en: I just wanted him to come and hear me sing.
'Cause I told him I was a good singer, and he didn't believe me.
translation.ko: 내가 노래 잘한다고 했는데 안 믿길래

translation.en: Is that the only reason you invited him?
the only person I wanna hear applauding is you.
translation.ko: 내가 듣고 싶은 건 네 박수 소리뿐이야

translation.en: I would applaud for you even if you fall flat on your face.
translation.ko: 네가 고꾸라져도 난 손뼉 칠 거야

translation.en: …and she has this aura about her that's magnetic.
[Irv] Yes. I was drawn to her right away when I saw her perform the other night.
translation.ko: 네, 얼마 전에 노래하는 걸 보고 완전히 매료됐어요

translation.en: [woman] Mm-hmm. I don't think I've ever met someone quite like her.
that kind of girl that only comes along once in a lifetime.
translation.ko: 평생 한 번 만날까 말까 한 사람이에요

translation.en: it's like God was showing off a little bit when He made her.
-[Irv] Sure. -That He breathed it on her vocal cords…
smiled when He made her spirit
and laughed when He finished that face.
[woman] Yeah. I think, uh, she made… He made something truly special.
Yeah, I… I just think that she's gonna change all of our lives.
translation.ko: 모두의 삶을 바꿀 만한 사람이 아닐까 싶어요
